Actions.Name: Cancel Shipment
Actions.Description: Cancels a shipment with a given shipment ID or tracking number

Actions.Name: Create a shipment
Actions.Description: Books a shipment with a carrier and returns a shipping label.

Actions.Name: Get Printers
Actions.Description: Request returns credentials, the list of available printers, their trays and some additional data.

Actions.Name: Get Available Rates
Actions.Description: Obtains available shipping rates based on shipping accounts provided.

Actions.Name: Print Shipping Label
Actions.Description: Sends a command to print the shipping label based on the base64 string

Actions.Name: Track Shipment
Actions.Description: Tracks a shipment with a carrier and returns the checkpoints.
